nodes.text: The Ro family was a family of a humanoid species, members of which included the Eyes of the Nihil Asgar Ro and his son Marchion Ro. Hailing from a homeworld, the family had a history entwined with the Jedi and a mysterious artifact, both of which Marchion believed to be connected to bad things which had befallen his ancestors. Several generations of the family had also held the hyperspace prospector Mari San Tekka prisoner to utilize her ability to discover the Paths, difficult-to-traverse hyperspace routes.
